original_text: Does not the very nature of things teach you that if a man has long hair, it is a disgrace to him,
korean_text: 만일 남자에게 긴 머리가 있으면 자기에게 부끄러움이 되는 것을 본성이 너희에게 가르치지 아니하느냐

sentences.original_text: Does not the very nature of things teach you
that if a man has long hair,
sentences.korean_translation: 만약 남자가 긴 머리를 가지고 있다면

sentences.original_text: it is a disgrace to him,
